        public void newGame(double x,
                    double y)
        Called when we start a new game. to initialize the state.
        Parameters:
        x - - X-Coordinate to move to at start.
        y - - Y-Coordinate to move to at start.

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint()
        Called when the player gets a point.

      • clipXY

        public void clipXY(double defaultX,
                   int height)
        Helper function to reset the players location if they go off screen. Intended to be called from a resize event.
        Parameters:
        defaultX - - The x-coordinate they should use.
        height - - The current height of the window.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draw the player's racket.
        Parameters:
        g - - a Graphics2D object to draw with.

      • update

        public void update(Ball ball,
                   double dt)
        Update the player's racket position.
        Parameters:
        ball: - Ball to keep track of.
        dt - : Number of milliseconds elapsed for the previous frame.

      • isHuman

        public boolean isHuman()
        Return true/false depending on if this player is human or computer controlled.
        Returns:
        True if human controlled, false if computer controlled.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Return the speed the racket moves. The controller needs this to update position (maybe I should refactor).
        Returns:
        - Racket's movement speed in pixels per second.

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Get the racket's x-coordinate for the top left corner.

        - The racket's x-coordinate for the top left corner.
